sections.title: About Us
sections.subtitle: Bóc Mệnh at bocmenh.com and the entire Bóc Mệnh ecosystem (abbreviated as BMP)

introduction.title: 1. General Introduction
content: BMP is an artificial intelligence platform specializing in fortune telling, destiny reading, feng shui, compatibility analysis, tarot, wedding date selection, house direction...
Developed by a team of experts, AI engineers with deep and authentic foundational knowledge.

mission.title: 2. Mission & Vision
mission.mission: Mission: Help millions of Vietnamese people become more confident in life through deep understanding of themselves and their surrounding environment.
mission.vision: Vision: Become the leading "All-in-one" platform for life consulting, spirituality and feng shui in Southeast Asia.

values.title: 3. Core Values
values.accuracy: Accuracy & Dedication: Interpretations based on big data, advanced AI algorithms and carefully selected profound knowledge.
values.privacy: Security & Respect: Respect privacy, maximize protection of user data.

technology.title: 4. Technology & Team
technology.ai: AI trained on clean, authentic datasets (feng shui books, numerology, folk cultural texts...), regularly updated.
technology.team: Development team with rich experience in Machine Learning, Data Engineering, UX/UI and legal fields.

partners.title: 5. Partners & Affiliations
partners.experts: Collaborate with feng shui experts, psychologists, speakers sharing practical experience.
partners.affiliates: Affiliate partnerships with reputable manufacturers and distributors of feng shui products and lucky items.

community.title: 6. Community Connection
community.content: Building forums for exchange, knowledge sharing, blogs, and answering questions.
